ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Bard BOTB
ygData.msgSnippet: Ooops and the prismatic blade is the best offhand 1handed weapon that I know of (28/35 i think), bard only and 1 per server cause it was given to the winner of
ygData.messageBody:
Ooops and the prismatic blade is the best offhand 1handed weapon that I
know of (28/35 i think), bard only and 1 per server cause it was given
to the winner of the first ToT if a bard was in the group.

-----Original Message-----
From: John Grady [mailto:john_grady@...]
Sent: Sunday, August 05, 2001 3:07 PM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Bard BOTB


I'm going to admit my naivete and ask what is so hot about primal
warswords and prismatic swords. Also, are they GM given items? Sounds
like
there's one primal perserver from the stuff I read.

Finally, can anyone list what gear these uber Bards like AftaThotte
have?
Just curious on this after reading how 60th lvl Bards with Epics are
drooling over some of this rare equipment.

Thanks,
Tzeetch, Minstrel of 52 Melodies
The Commune, Xegony

--- "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <garramone@...>
wrote:


an sow potion is a right-click item.  the message is:

Aftathott is infused with the power of an avatar.

-----Original Message-----
From: Christopher M Andrews [mailto:cmandy_drew@...]
Sent: Sunday, August 05, 2001 2:08 PM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Bard BOTB


So much for the bards without primal weapons. Procing Avatar will surely
make or break the bard here. I guess the only way to keep the fight even
is to have Syvelian's Anti-Magic Aria ready when you see it go off. I
think
the message is (something) with/like an Avatar. If you see that, keel!!

I am wondering about SoW potions though, how are those classified; right
click item?

Thanks,
Pava
